definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: A visit to one of these places is well worth while.
sentences.chinese: 這些地方的任何一處都是很值得一去的。

sentences.english: A thing that we need to celebrate much more than we are doing already.
sentences.chinese: 一樣值得我們進一步頌揚的東西。

sentences.english: Time is respected by not wasting it.
sentences.chinese: 不浪費時間是值得尊重的。

sentences.english: "The abductee issue is [one] of grave concern, " Clinton said.
sentences.chinese: “綁架問題值得嚴重關切，”希拉里說。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文獻中沒有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: Do you think it's worth paying so much for designer products?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得爲設計師的產品花那麼多錢值得嗎？

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，卻值得商榷。

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想縮短時間，斷熱烹調的燜燒鍋值得推薦。

sentences.english: Getting up at 6 a. m. to watch the sun rise over Mei Li Snow Mountain was worth it.
sentences.chinese: 早上六點就起牀去梅里雪山看日出是值得的。

sentences.english: It is worth rethinking to provide member investment choice.
sentences.chinese: 而提供成員投資選擇更值得反思。

sentences.english: Still, the issue James raised back in 1905 remains pertinent.
sentences.chinese: 然而詹姆斯在1905年提出的主題然仍值得討論。

sentences.english: Of course, there are many other recommended classic song.
sentences.chinese: 當然，其他也有不少值得推薦的經典之曲。

sentences.english: But that isn't something worth celebrating, at least not for Chinese mayors.
sentences.chinese: 可惜這並不值得慶祝，至少對於中國的市長們是如此。

sentences.english: Toby, to his credit, didn’t need to be told twice.
sentences.chinese: 託比這一點值得讚揚，他不必我說第二次。

sentences.english: Besides, the McCain dictum is debatable.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，麥凱恩的順口溜也值得商榷。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，報告同時發現，美國邊界亦岌岌可危。

definition: to take up time/to spend time
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
